Body:
report = pd.DataFrame([wthr.HourlyWeatherReport(lat=self.lat, lon=self.lon,
    date=self.day - dt.timedelta(hours=i), time=self.time).dict for i in
    range(23)])
cols = list(set(wthr.HOURLY_COLS) - {'lat', 'lon', 'date', 'time'})
for c in cols:
    report[c] = 0.5
req = wthr.WeatherRequest(lat=self.lat, lon=self.lon, date=self.day,
    zipcode=None)
args = dict(report=report), req
t = wthr.summarize_report(args)
cols = list({k for k in t['report'].keys()} - {'lat', 'lon', 'date',
    'zipcode', 'precip_sum'})
for c in cols:
    if 'IQR' in c or 'std' in c:
        self.assertTrue(t['report'][c] == 0.0)
    else:
        self.assertTrue(t['report'][c] == 0.5)
self.assertTrue(t['report']['precip_sum'] == 11.5)
